https://support.crytivo.com.search_query: How do I reset my password?
instructions: Go to http://crytivo.com/
Click 'Sign In' in the upper right corner
Click 'Forgot Password'

https://tradalaxy.zendesk.com.search_query: How do I reset my password?
instructions: Go to https://my.tradalaxy.com/login
In the Password to Tradalaxy field on the sign-in page, click Forgot password?

https://support.ziprecruiter.com/.search_query: How do I reset my password?
instructions: Go to https://www.ziprecruiter.com/
Click Sign in in the upper right corner of the screen
Click I'm a job Seeker
Click Forgot password at the bottom
Enter your email address
Click Reset Password

https://support.piazza.com.search_query: How do I create a class?
instructions: Go to Piazza.com
Click the blue Professors and TAs Get Started button
Enter your school
Enter your class name for the correct term and click + Create a New Class:
Enter  your class name
Enter your class number
Click Create Class

https://www.nike.com/help.search_query: How do I reset my password?
instructions: Go to Nike.com.
click Sign in in the upper right corner.
Click Forgot Password?
Enter the email address connected to your Nike Member profile and click “RESET.” We’ll email you instructions on how to reset your password.

https://leviscs.zendesk.com/.search_query: How do I add a shipping address?
instructions: Click on My Account
Click on the Shipping Address section
Click ADD A NEW ADDRESS

https://www.wellsfargo.com/help/.search_query: How do I change my password?
instructions: Go to https://connect.secure.wellsfargo.com/auth/login/present?origin=cob&LOB=CONS
Click Change Username
Click Change Password

https://support.atlassian.com/.search_query: How do I create a new project?
instructions: Select Projects
Select Create project in the navigation.
Choose either a classic project or a next-gen project.
Give your project a name.
Select Create.
Go to https://signup.ebay.com/pa/crte
Enter your First Name
Enter your Last Name
Enter your Email
Enter your Password
Click Create Account
Go to https://web.whatsapp.com/
Click Menu
Click Log out.

https://help.yahoo.com/.search_query: How do I change my password?
instructions: Go to https://login.yahoo.com/account/security?.lang=en-US&.intl=us&.src=yhelp
Click Change password.
Enter a new password.
Click Continue.

https://www.help.tinder.com.search_query: How do I update my phone number?
instructions: Go to Tinder.com
Click the profile icon
Scroll to Account Settings
Click Phone Number > Update My Phone Number
Enter your new phone number and follow steps for SMS verification

https://squareup.com/help/.search_query: How can I link a bank account?
instructions: Go to https://squareup.com/dashboard/business/bank-accounts-overview
Click Account & Settings
Click Bank Accounts
Click Add Bank Account
Enter your Routing # and Acoount #
Click Verify

https://www.tripadvisorsupport.com/.search_query: How can I report that my accommodation has temporarily closed?
instructions: Sign into your Management Center.
From the top bar select “Manage listing” then click on “Name & description”.
The “General details” page will open.
Toggle the selector to “on” in the corner of the right side of the “Mark your property as temporarily closed” box.
Select the date range for the temporary closure message to appear on your listing.
No need to click Submit.

https://www.tripadvisorsupport.com/.search_query: How can I update my business hours?
instructions: Log into your Management Center.
From the top menu, click “Manage Listing”.
Select “Hours” from the drop-down menu.
Update the existing hours or click the “Delete” icon beside the hours that you want to remove.

https://www.tripadvisorsupport.com/.search_query: How can I manage my reviews?
instructions: Log in to the Management Center
Under the “Reviews” tab in the top menu, click “Respond to Reviews”
Select the review with the Management Response you'd like to remove
Under “Response Published”, click “Delete Response” or the trash can icon

https://www.tripadvisorsupport.com/.search_query: How can I update payment info related to my business?
instructions: Log into your Management Center.
Hover over the “Help & Settings” menu at the top of the page, and click Billing and Payments.”
On the left-hand side, under “Billing Information,” click “Update.”
Update your method of payment or billing information and click “Save.”

https://www.tripadvisorsupport.com/.search_query: How can I report my hotel has closed?
instructions: Sign into https://www.tripadvisor.com/Owners.
From the top bar select “Manage listing” then click on “Name & description”.
Click on “Listing Support” on the left menu.
Click on “Report Closure” and add a comment.
Click on “Report Closure” again to submit your request.

https://www.yelp-support.com/.search_query: How do I report a review?
instructions: Locate the review in the Reviews section of your business account
Find the More Options button (the three dots) and click Report Review

https://www.yelp-support.com/.search_query: How do I remove a review I posted?
instructions: Go to the Reviews section of your account
Click Remove Review (the trash can icon) below the review you would like to remove
Click Confirm

https://www.yelp-support.com/.search_query: How do I set which emails I receive from Yelp?
instructions: Go to the Account Settings section of your account
Click Email / Notifications
Click the checkboxes to select which notifications you'd like to receive
Click Save Notification Settings

https://www.yelp-support.com/.search_query: How do I sign up for Yelp?
instructions: Go to http://yelp.com/signup
Click Sign up with Facebook or enter your name, email address, password, and zip code and then click Sign Up
Follow the steps on the next pages to add a profile photo and find friends on Yelp

https://www.yelp-support.com/.search_query: How do I edit one of my reviews?
instructions: Go to http://yelp.com/user_details_reviews_self
Click Edit review (the pencil icon) below the review you would like to edit
Edit the review text
Click Post to save your edited review

https://www.yelp-support.com/.search_query: How do I edit one of my reviews?
instructions: Go to http://yelp.com/profile
Click Payment Information
Click the trash can icon to Delete
Go to https://yelp.com/profile
Click Friends
Click the grey X to the right of the friend's name

https://robinhood.com.search_query: How do I create an account?
instructions: Tap the Account menu bar at the top right of the screen
Tap Robinhood Gold.

https://help.instagram.com/.search_query: How do I create an account?
instructions: Go to instagram.com.
Click Sign up, enter your email address, create a username and password

https://help.instagram.com/.search_query: How do I temporarily disable my account?
instructions: Log into instagram.com from a computer.
Click your profile picture in the top right and click Profile, then click Edit Profile.
Scroll down, then click Temporarily disable my account in the bottom right.
Select an option from the drop-down menu next to Why are you disabling your account? and re-enter your password.
Click Temporarily Disable Account.

https://help.pinterest.com.search_query: How do I Log in to your personal or business account?
instructions: Go to pinterest.com/login
Enter your email address and password
Click Log in

https://help.pinterest.com.search_query: How do I Log out to your personal or business account?
instructions: Click the directional chevron down icon at the top-right of the screen to open your menu
Click Log out

https://help.pinterest.com.search_query: How do I add an accounts?
instructions: Click at the top of Pinterest
Select Add account
Enter your email and password then click Log in

https://help.pinterest.com.search_query: How do I switch between accounts?
instructions: When you're logged into Pinterest, click  below your profile picture
Click on one of your other accounts to switch to that account

https://help.pinterest.com.search_query: How do I change my email?
instructions: Click  at the top of Pinterest to open your menu
Click Edit settings
Click Account settings on the left side of the screen
Enter your new email address in the Email Address field
Click Done

https://help.pinterest.com.search_query: How do I reactive my account?
instructions: Go to pinterest.com/login
Enter the email and password associated with the account you want to reactivate
Click Log in

https://help.pinterest.com.search_query: How do I reactive my account?
instructions: Go to pinterest.com/login
Click Continue with Facebook
Enter the email and password associated with your Facebook account
Click Continue

https://help.pinterest.com.search_query: How do I create a pin from my photos?
instructions: Log into your Pinterest account(opens in a new window) and click the plus icon at the bottom-right of your profile or home feed
Click Create a Pin
Drag and drop or click the directional arrow up circle icon to upload your image
Add a title, a description, and the destination link
Click Select above the title next to Save
Select the board you want to save to or click Create board to create a new one
Click Save

https://help.pinterest.com.search_query: How do I reset my password?
instructions: Go to http://pinterest.com/password/reset
Enter your email, name, or username to find your account, then click Search
Click This is me next to your account to send a password reset link to your email inbox
Check the email address connected to your account for a password reset email
From the email, click Reset password and enter your new password
Click Change Password

https://help.pinterest.com.search_query: How do I change my password?
instructions: Log into your https://www.pinterest.com/login
Click the directional chevron down icon at the top-right of your screen, then click Settings
Click Account settings from the left-side navigation
Click Change your password
Enter your old password followed by your new password
Click Change Password
Click Done

https://help.pinterest.com.search_query: How do I hide a pin on my home feed?
instructions: Log into your Pinterest account
From your home feed, click the ellipsis icon in the bottom-right corner of the Pin
Click Hide Pin
Select a reason for hiding the Pin
Open the profile of the person you'd like to block
Click  on the left (FLAG BUTTON)
Click Block
Click OK to confirm

https://help.pinterest.com.search_query: How do I stop getting emails?
instructions: Log into your https://www.pinterest.com/login and click the directional chevron down icon in the top-right corner
Select Settings
Click Notifications from the left-side navigation
Click Edit next to By email
Click Turn off all
Click Done at the top of the page

https://help.pinterest.com.search_query: How do I find my account email?
instructions: Click  at the top of Pinterest to open your menu
Click Edit settings
Click Account settings on the left side of the screen
Your email address will be listed under Basic information

https://help.pinterest.com.search_query: How do I Remove your email from a Pinterest account?
instructions: Open an email you received from Pinterest
Click Unsubscribe at the bottom of the email
Click Didn’t sign up for Pinterest? Let us know when Pinterest opens on the screen
Click Remove my email address

https://help.pinterest.com.search_query: How do I update my search privacy?
instructions: Click  at the top of Pinterest to open your menu (ELLIPSES)
Click Edit settings
Click Privacy and data on the left side of the screen
Under “Search Privacy”, check the box next to Hide your profile from search engines
Click Confirm
Click Done

https://help.pinterest.com.search_query: How do I create an advertiser account?
instructions: From Pinterest, click Ads in the top left corner then select Overview to open the Ads Manager
Click  next to your name (ARROW BUTTON)
Click Create new ad account
Enter a name for the ad account
Click Save

https://help.pinterest.com.search_query: How do I create a campaign?
instructions: Log into http://pinterest.com/business/create/
Click Ads at the top of the screen, then click Create ad
Select a goal and add your Campaign details
Click Continue to create your campaign
Go to Walmart.com
Select the avatar icon in the upper-right corner
Select Track Order

https://www.walmart.com/help/.search_query: How do I get a return label?
instructions: Log in to your account.
In your Purchase History, scroll to the order you want to return.
Click Order Details.
Click Print Return Label next to the item's return date

https://www.walmart.com/help/.search_query: How do I cancel or edit an order
instructions: In the upper-right corner of any Walmart.com page, click the Account icon.
Select Track Order.
Enter the email address used to place the order and the order number shown on your order confirmation email.
Click Cancel next to the item you wish to attempt to cancel.

https://www.walmart.com/help/.search_query: How do I reset my password?
instructions: Open the forgot password page.
Enter the email address registered to your Walmart.com account.
Select Request Verification Code.
Check your email for the code. Be sure to check your junk or spam folder.
Enter the code and a new password that you haven't used before.
Select Submit.

https://www.walmart.com/help/.search_query: How do I add a mobile number for pickup orders?
instructions: Add or change your mobile number by signing in to your account, then Account
In the correct order, select See Details
Next to Pickup Person, select Edit
Enter your mobile number and select Save

https://www.walmart.com/help/.search_query: How do I create an account?
instructions: Select the Account button in the upper-right corner of Walmart.com
Click Create an Account
Enter your name and email address on the sign-up screen
Create a password and confirm it
Select Create Account

https://www.walmart.com/help/.search_query: How do I edit a payment
instructions: Go to your account.
Select Payment Methods from the bar on the left side of the screen.
Select Edit next to the payment method you want to change, or Delete to remove a payment method.

https://www.walmart.com/help/.search_query: How do I edit a payment
instructions: Go to your account.
Select Payment Methods from the bar on the left side of the screen.
Select Edit next to the payment method you want to change, or Delete to remove a payment method.

https://www.uhc.com/.search_query: How do I register on myuhc.com
instructions: Enter the number on your health plan ID card.
Choose a username and password.
Enter an email address.
Enter a phone number or choose security questions.

https://support.google.com/.search_query: Manage your device identity and protected content
instructions: At the top right, click More More and then Settings.
Under Privacy and security, click Site settings.
Click Protected Content.
Turn off Allow sites to play protected content.

https://support.google.com/.search_query: Add or remove inbox categories & tabs in Gmail
instructions: On your computer, open Gmail.
At the top right, click Settings Settings and then See all settings.
Click the Inbox tab.
In the Inbox type section, select Default. Note: To hide all tabs, select another inbox type.
In the Categories section, check the boxes of tabs you want to show. Note: You can't make new tabs; you can only show or hide existing ones.
Scroll to the bottom, then click Save Changes.
Open your Google Account. You might need to sign in.
Under Security, select Signing in to Google.
Choose Password. You might need to sign in again.
Enter your new password, then select Change Password.

https://support.google.com/.search_query: How do I create an account?
instructions: Go to the Google Account creation page.
Follow the steps on the screen to set up your account.
Use the account you created to sign in to Gmail.

https://support.google.com/.search_query: How do I add a signature?
instructions: On your computer, go to Gmail.
In the top right, click Settings Settings and then See all settings.
At the top, choose a settings page, such as General, Labels, or Inbox.
Make your changes.
After you're done with each page, click Save Changes at the bottom.

https://support.google.com/.search_query: How do I send confidential emails
instructions: On your computer, go to Gmail.
Click Compose.
In the bottom right of the window, click Turn on confidential mode Turn on confidential mode.
Set an expiration date and passcode. These settings impact both the message text and any attachments.
Click Save.

https://support.google.com/.search_query: How do I remove access early?
instructions: On your computer, open Gmail.
On the left, click Sent.
Open the confidential email.
Click Remove access.
Open Gmail.
In the top right, click Help Help and then Send feedback.
Type your comments into the box.
At the bottom right, click Send.

https://support.google.com/.search_query: How do I Search for your chat messages in Gmail?
instructions: On your computer, go to Gmail.
At the top, in the search box, enter your search terms.
Click Enter
Under the search box, click Chat.
Click the chat you want to open.

https://support.google.com/.search_query: How do I Get Google Workspace add-ons?
instructions: On your computer, go to Gmail.
In the top right, click Settings Settingsand then Get add-ons.
Search for and select the tool you want to use with Gmail.
In the top right, click Install and then Continue.
Choose your account, then follow the steps on the screen.

https://support.google.com/.search_query: How do I remove Google Workspace add-ons?
instructions: On your computer, go to Gmail.
In the top right, click Settings Settings and then See all settings.
Click the Add-ons tab.
In the Installed add-ons section, click Manage.
Click More More and then Remove.

https://support.google.com/.search_query: How do I Change your status on Gmail?
instructions: On the top left, tap Menu Menu .
From your status indicator, tap Down arrow Down .
Choose how long you want to mute your notifications and appear as Do not disturb.

https://support.google.com/.search_query: How do I request a read receipt?
instructions: On your computer, open Gmail.
Click Compose.
Compose your email as you normally would.
At the bottom right, click More options More send options and then Request read receipt.
Send your message.
Log in to your account page.
Click EDIT PROFILE.
Under Email, enter your new email address.
Confirm your password.
Click SAVE PROFILE.
Log in to your account page.
Click SIGN OUT EVERYWHERE.
Log in to spotify.com/redeem.
Enter the PIN on the back of the card, or the code from your receipt.
Click Redeem.
Log in to your account page.
Click Receipts in the menu on the left.
Click VIEW next to a transaction to see more details.

https://support.spotify.com.search_query: Invite members to a family plan
instructions: Go to your account page.
Scroll down to Manage your family accounts.
Select the option to add or remove members.
Click the playlist image.
In the Edit view, enter a playlist name and description.
Click CHOOSE IMAGE to upload a new cover image, or REPLACE IMAGE to replace an existing image.
Click SAVE.

https://support.spotify.com.search_query: How can I recover a deleted playlist
instructions: Log in to your account page.
Click Recover playlists in the menu on the left.
Click RESTORE by the playlist you want to recover.
Open Spotify and find the restored playlist at the bottom of your playlist collection.
Log in to your account page.
Under Your plan, click CHANGE PLAN
Scroll to Spotify Free and click CANCEL PREMIUM.
Continue through to the confirmation message.
Click the menu button with the blue dot .
Select Update Available. Restart Now.
Locate the claim code.
Go to Your Account.
Click Apply a Gift Card to Your Account .
Enter your claim code and click Apply to Your Balance.
Go to Your Games and Software Library.
Locate the code associated with your order.
Enter in the code exactly as it is shown within the redemption process on the appropriate device (computer, console, or handheld device).

https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/.search_query: Sign Up for the Amazon Prime Free Trial
instructions: Go to Amazon Prime Free Trial.
Click Start your free trial.
Go to Your Orders and select the order you want to cancel.
Select the check box next to each item you want to remove from the order. To cancel the entire order, select all of the items.
Select Cancel checked items when finished.
In Your Account, go to Login & security.
Next to the account information you'd like to update, select Edit.
Follow the on-screen instructions and select Save Changes.
After you've completed all your updates, select Done.
Go to 1-Click Settings.
Click Make default located next to your address, then click Change next to the Nickname, Payment Method, or Shipping Method options.
Note: All 1-Click orders for items fulfilled by sellers other than Amazon.com will ship via Standard Shipping.
Go to your Browsing History.
Select Remove from view below each item you'd like to remove. To remove all items, select Manage history and then select Remove all items from view.
Go to Your Lists and select the list you want to delete.
On the list menu (...), click Manage Lists.
Click Delete.
Click Save Changes in the Manage Lists window to confirm.
Go to Your Orders.
Go to the order you want to track.
Click Track Package next to your order (if shipped separately).

https://learn.hellofurther.com.search_query: How can I set up Direct Deposit?
instructions: Sign in at www.hellofurther.com.
Click My Profile.
Choose Payment and Banking from the menu.
On the Payments & Banking page, click Bank Accounts.
If you do not have a bank account set up, click Add Bank Account.
Enter the banking information for the account you wish to set up with Direct Deposit

https://stackoverflow.com/help.search_query: How do I add or remove login credentials from my account?
instructions: Go to https://stackoverflow.com/users/account-recovery
Enter your Email
Click Edit Profile and Settings
CLick My Logins
Click the remove link next to each login
